overview: Vinodh (Kunal) and Manoj (Karan) are best friends. Manoj gives Vinodh a manager job of his three-star hotel. They both are in love with Neetha (Monal), but Neetha is actually in love with Vinodh. This causes a strain in their friendship, and Manoj fires Vinodh from his manager job.  The film ends with a message to the audience that 'love is divine (pleasing) but friendship is pristine (unspoilt)
title: Paarvai Ondre Podhume
